job.title: Senior Software Engineer (Full-Stack)
job.description: RStudio is seeking a candidate for a Senior Software Engineer FullStack to join the RStudio Cloud team RStudio Cloud is a software as a service product designed to help professionals hobbyists trainers teachers and students to more easily do share teach and learn data science using RStudios best in class IDE with the convenience of cloud computingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout The JobltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtIn this position you will be an instrumental member of a crossfunctional team working to build the RStudios next generation data science platform RStudio Cloud You will have the opportunity to take ownership and drive the development and delivery of major product enhancements upanddown the software stack You will be asked to share your expertise in building high quality userfocused software through mentorship and leadership opportunities As a fullstack engineer we anticipate your focus to be a mix of frontend 70 and backend 30 work You will be responsible forltbrgtltulgtltligtdriving the delivery of significant new product features from planning through releaseltligtltligtdeveloping testing and maintaining missioncritical userfacing web applications ltligtltligtparticipating in and leading planning grooming and design discussionsltligtltligtgiving and receiving feedback from other engineers in the form of code reviewsltligtltligtmentoring other engineers on best practices and techniquesltligtltligtsupporting our users via support tickets and through our community forumsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout YoultbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtYou are userfocused and driven by our mission to facilitate science and education for everyone You share our commitment to building great software by striving for elegant design clean welltested code and delightful user experiences You accel at breaking down complex problems into bitesize tasks and driving them to completion You love to learn and to help others succeed through code review and other forms of mentorship You are humble pragmatic deliberate and you have a keen sense of empathy for your coworkers and users You also haveltbrgtltulgtltligt8 years of professional software development experience including 5 years of JavaScript development using modern webapplication frameworks ReactJS AngularJS VueJS or similar and 3 years of working on backend web applications using a highlevel objectoriented language Python Go Java Nodejs C or similarltligtltligta deep expertise in writing clean modular and highly testable codeltligtltligta demonstrated experience delivering substantial cross disciplinary software projectsltligtltligta proficiency with using and building RESTbased APIsltligtltligta understanding of designing SQL database schemasltligtltligta comfort working on large multilangage complex code bases ltligtltligta commitment to and experience with writing tests ltligtltligta love of wellwritten documentationltligtltligtand a passion for leaving things better than you found themltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe are a funloving and diverse group who share a passion for building highquality software and delivering a great user experience Our team members live in various locations across the United States and occasionally elsewhere and work together via Slack holding regularly scheduled and adhoc video calls and communicating our ideas through documents images and code and code reviewsltbrgtltulgtltligtWe welcome all talented engineers and are committed to a culture that represents diversity in all its formsltligtltligtWe prioritize giving engineers focus time to get deep work done We minimize meetings and attempt to operate asynchronouslyltligtltligtWe are a learning organization and take mentorship and career growth seriously We hope to learn from you and we anticipate that you will also deepen your skills influence and leadership as a result of working at RStudioltligtltligtWe operate under a unique sustainable business model 50 of engineering we do at RStudio is open source We are profitable and we plan to be around twenty years from nowltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtNotableltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt100 distributed team with minimal travelltligtltligtCompetitive compensation with great benefits includingltligtltulgtltligtMedicalDentalVision insurance 100 of premiums covered ltligtltligt401k MatchingltligtltligtA home office allowance or reimbursement for a coworking spaceltligtltligtA profitsharing systemltligtltligtFlexible environment with a generous vacation policyltbrgtltligtltulgtltulgtRStudio is committed to being a diverse and inclusive workplace We encourage applicants of different backgrounds cultures genders experiences abilities and perspectives to apply All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color national origin religion sexual orientation gender gender identity age physical disability or length of time spent unemployedltbrgtltbrgt
